structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: The provisions of KRS 90.310 to 90.410 are independent of and do not affect the laws governing the police and fire departments, nor their pension funds, as provided in KRS Chapter 95.
